learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): The word husky has more than one meaning. Choose the sentence in which husky means "r...

p.b: The word husky has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which husky means "rough or gruff sounding."

simpleChoice.p: Since my younger brother is husky, he wouldn't fit into my jeans.
Jason's gray and white husky pulls a sled in the winter.
When Julie answered the phone early in the morning, her voice was husky.
Gemma was supposed to clean the corn, but it was still a little husky.
